typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		PATENT_ID as string,
		PATENT_TITLE as string,
		PROJECT_ID as string,
		PATENT_ORG_NAME as string,
		LOAD_FILE as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	format: 'parquet') ~> StagePatents
source(output(
		PATENT_ID as string,
		PATENT_TITLE as string,
		PROJECT_ID as string,
		PATENT_ORG_NAME as string,
		LOAD_FILE as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> DefaultDimPatent
StagePatents derive(PATENT_ID = rtrim(substring(byName('PATENT_ID'), 1, 30)),
		PATENT_TITLE = rtrim(substring(byName('PATENT_TITLE'), 1, 500)),
		PROJECT_ID = rtrim(substring(byName('PROJECT_ID'), 1, 30)),
		CREATED_DATE = currentTimestamp()) ~> MapPatents
MapPatents aggregate(groupBy(PATENT_ID),
	each(match(name!='PATENT_ID'), $$ = first($$))) ~> AggregatePatents
AggregatePatents select(mapColumn(
		PATENT_ID,
		PATENT_TITLE,
		CREATED_DATE
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDistinctPatents
SelectDistinctPatents sink(input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string,
		Column_9 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
